segments.text: Excuse me , do the buses stop here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they all stop at this corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go to Broadway and 82nd Street.Can I take any bus that comes along ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take any bus except the Number 9 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How often do the buses run ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They run about every five minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine.How long does it take to get to 82nd Street ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About fifteen minutes.It ' s not far.Are you a stranger in New York ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am . I arrived only three days ago from Japan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you like New York city ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like it very much , but it's a little confusing to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll soon get accustomed to it.It ' s not difficult.Well , here's the bus.Fortunately , it's not full .
segments.speaker: S2
